```{r}
#concatenate all patients BOLD-alff.tsv files
files_list_alff_xcpd_4S356Parcel = list.files(path = "/scratch/galinejad/ScanD/SHARED_FOLDER_25/xcp_d/0.7.3/", pattern="4S356Parcels_stat-alff_bold.tsv", recursive = TRUE, full.names=TRUE)

alff_xcpd_4S356Parcel_results = map_dfr(files_list_alff_xcpd, function(x)
  {read_delim (x, delim = "\t", show_col_types = FALSE, na=c("NA", "", "n/a")) %>% 
    mutate(subject = str_extract(x, pattern = "sub-[^/\\\\_]+")) %>% 
    select(subject, everything())
})
```
